ygData.subject: Re: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Well if they re having a lot of fun, they must not be the people complaining about the binding issue then. -- Artificial Intelligence stands no chance
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, Oct 04/99, "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...> wrote:
> From: "Blair, Keith (Keith Blair)" <kblair@...>
>
> > I'm going to have to agree Everquest is a game for
> > people who have lots of time on their hands. It's
> > something the casual player is going to have to
> > either accept or move on.
>
> What is your point? That people that don't spend a
> lot of time in EQ should move on? I know people that
> only play one hour every other day and have a great
> amount of fun.

Well if they're having a lot of fun, they must not be the people
complaining about the binding issue then.


--
Artificial Intelligence stands no chance against Natural Stupidity.
